mapper.insert: INSERT into t_finance(serial_number, `type`, money, state, `module`, create_date, create_user, confirm_user, confirm_date,mark,module_serial_number) VALUES (#{serialNumber},#{type},#{money},#{state},#{module},#{createDate},#{createUser},#{confirmUser},#{confirmDate},#{mark},#{moduleSerialNumber})
mapper.update: update t_finance set state = #{state},confirm_user=#{confirmUser},confirm_date=#{confirmDate} where id = #{id}
